results.name: managed-switch
results.help: Configure FortiSwitch devices that are managed by this FortiGate.

fsw-wan1-admin.name: fsw-wan1-admin
fsw-wan1-admin.help: FortiSwitch WAN1 admin status; enable to authorize the FortiSwitch as a managed switch.

options.name: global
options.help: Use global setting for DHCP snooping server access list.

options.name: enable
options.help: Override global setting and enable DHCP server access list.

options.name: disable
options.help: Override global setting and disable DHCP server access list.

dynamic-capability.name: dynamic-capability
dynamic-capability.help: List of features this FortiSwitch supports (not configurable) that is sent to the FortiGate device for subsequent configuration initiated by the FortiGate device.

ptp-status.name: ptp-status
ptp-status.help: Enable/disable PTP profile on this FortiSwitch.

route-offload.name: route-offload
route-offload.help: Enable/disable route offload on this FortiSwitch.

route-offload-mclag.name: route-offload-mclag
route-offload-mclag.help: Enable/disable route offload MCLAG on this FortiSwitch.

route-offload-router.name: route-offload-router
route-offload-router.help: Configure route offload MCLAG IP address.

assignment-priority.name: assignment-priority
assignment-priority.help: 802.1x Radius (Tunnel-Private-Group-Id) VLANID assign-by-name priority. A smaller value has a higher priority.

type.name: type
type.help: Indication of switch type, physical or virtual.

owner-vdom.name: owner-vdom
owner-vdom.help: VDOM which owner of port belongs to.

flow-identity.name: flow-identity
flow-identity.help: Flow-tracking netflow ipfix switch identity in hex format(00000000-FFFFFFFF default=0).

delayed-restart-trigger.name: delayed-restart-trigger
delayed-restart-trigger.help: Delayed restart triggered for this FortiSwitch.

firmware-provision.name: firmware-provision
firmware-provision.help: Enable/disable provisioning of firmware to FortiSwitches on join connection.

firmware-provision-version.name: firmware-provision-version
firmware-provision-version.help: Firmware version to provision to this FortiSwitch on bootup (major.minor.build, i.e. 6.2.1234).

firmware-provision-latest.name: firmware-provision-latest
firmware-provision-latest.help: Enable/disable one-time automatic provisioning of the latest firmware version.

options.name: disable
options.help: Do not automatically provision the latest available firmware.

options.name: once
options.help: Automatically attempt a one-time upgrade to the latest available firmware version.

speed.name: speed
speed.help: Switch port speed; default and available settings depend on hardware.

status.name: status
status.help: Switch port admin status: up or down.

ptp-status.name: ptp-status
ptp-status.help: Enable/disable PTP policy on this FortiSwitch port.

options.name: bandwidth
options.help: Member selection based on largest total bandwidth of links of similar speed.

options.name: count
options.help: Member selection based on largest count of similar link speed.

flap-rate.name: flap-rate
flap-rate.help: Number of stage change events needed within flap-duration.

flap-duration.name: flap-duration
flap-duration.help: Period over which flap events are calculated (seconds).

rpvst-port.name: rpvst-port
rpvst-port.help: Enable/disable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.

options.name: disabled
options.help: Disable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.

options.name: enabled
options.help: Enable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.

p2p-port.name: p2p-port
p2p-port.help: General peer to peer tunnel port.

restricted-auth-port.name: restricted-auth-port
restricted-auth-port.help: Peer to Peer Restricted Authenticated port.

options.name: perpetual-fast
options.help: Early power delivered during cold boot.

vlan.name: vlan
vlan.help: Assign switch ports to a VLAN.

allowed-vlans-all.name: allowed-vlans-all
allowed-vlans-all.help: Enable/disable all defined vlans on this port.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable all defined VLANs on this port.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable all defined VLANs on this port.

type.name: type
type.help: Interface type: physical or trunk port.

matched-dpp-policy.name: matched-dpp-policy
matched-dpp-policy.help: Matched child policy in the dynamic port policy.

matched-dpp-intf-tags.name: matched-dpp-intf-tags
matched-dpp-intf-tags.help: Matched interface tags in the dynamic port policy.

dhcp-snoop-option82-trust.name: dhcp-snoop-option82-trust
dhcp-snoop-option82-trust.help: Enable/disable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.

arp-inspection-trust.name: arp-inspection-trust
arp-inspection-trust.help: Trusted or untrusted dynamic ARP inspection.

igmp-snooping-flood-reports.name: igmp-snooping-flood-reports
igmp-snooping-flood-reports.help: Enable/disable flooding of IGMP reports to this interface when igmp-snooping enabled.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable flooding of IGMP snooping reports to this interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable flooding of IGMP snooping reports to this interface.

mcast-snooping-flood-traffic.name: mcast-snooping-flood-traffic
mcast-snooping-flood-traffic.help: Enable/disable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.

stp-state.name: stp-state
stp-state.help: Enable/disable Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) on this interface.

stp-root-guard.name: stp-root-guard
stp-root-guard.help: Enable/disable STP root guard on this interface.

options.name: enabled
options.help: Enable STP root-guard on this interface.

options.name: disabled
options.help: Disable STP root-guard on this interface.

stp-bpdu-guard.name: stp-bpdu-guard
stp-bpdu-guard.help: Enable/disable STP BPDU guard on this interface.

options.name: enabled
options.help: Enable STP BPDU guard on this interface.

options.name: disabled
options.help: Disable STP BPDU guard on this interface.

edge-port.name: edge-port
edge-port.help: Enable/disable this interface as an edge port, bridging connections between workstations and/or computers.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable this interface as an edge port.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable this interface as an edge port.

options.name: all-untagged
options.help: Discard all frames that are untagged.

options.name: all-tagged
options.help: Discard all frames that are tagged.

packet-sampler.name: packet-sampler
packet-sampler.help: Enable/disable packet sampling on this interface.

options.name: enabled
options.help: Enable packet sampling on this interface.

options.name: disabled
options.help: Disable packet sampling on this interface.

sflow-counter-interval.name: sflow-counter-interval
sflow-counter-interval.help: sFlow sampling counter polling interval in seconds (0 - 255).

options.name: cl74
options.help: Enable Clause 74 FC-FEC, which only applies to 25Gbps.

options.name: cl91
options.help: Enable Clause 91 RS-FEC, which only applies to 100Gbps.

options.name: tx
options.help: Enable flow control for transmission pause control frames.

options.name: rx
options.help: Enable flow control for receive pause control frames.

options.name: both
options.help: Enable flow control for both transmission and receive pause control frames.

pause-meter.name: pause-meter
pause-meter.help: Configure ingress pause metering rate, in kbps (default = 0, disabled).

pause-meter-resume.name: pause-meter-resume
pause-meter-resume.help: Resume threshold for resuming traffic on ingress port.

options.help: Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 75% of pause threshold.
Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 50% of pause threshold.
Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 25% of pause threshold.

loop-guard.name: loop-guard
loop-guard.help: Enable/disable loop-guard on this interface, an STP optimization used to prevent network loops.

port-policy.name: port-policy
port-policy.help: Switch controller dynamic port policy from available options.

qos-policy.name: qos-policy
qos-policy.help: Switch controller QoS policy from available options.

storm-control-policy.name: storm-control-policy
storm-control-policy.help: Switch controller storm control policy from available options.

port-security-policy.name: port-security-policy
port-security-policy.help: Switch controller authentication policy to apply to this managed switch from available options.

export-to-pool.name: export-to-pool
export-to-pool.help: Switch controller export port to pool-list.

interface-tags.name: interface-tags
interface-tags.help: Tag(s) associated with the interface for various features including virtual port pool, dynamic port policy.

tag-name.name: tag-name
tag-name.help: FortiSwitch port tag name when exported to a virtual port pool or matched to dynamic port policy.

learning-limit.name: learning-limit
learning-limit.help: Limit the number of dynamic MAC addresses on this Port (1 - 128, 0 = no limit, default).

sticky-mac.name: sticky-mac
sticky-mac.help: Enable or disable sticky-mac on the interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sticky mac on the interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sticky mac on the interface.

export-to.name: export-to
export-to.help: Export managed-switch port to a tenant VDOM.

log-mac-event.name: log-mac-event
log-mac-event.help: Enable/disable logging for dynamic MAC address events.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable log MAC event for this interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable log MAC event for this interface.

lacp-speed.name: lacp-speed
lacp-speed.help: End Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) messages every 30 seconds (slow) or every second (fast).

mode.name: mode
mode.help: LACP mode: ignore and do not send control messages, or negotiate 802.3ad aggregation passively or actively.

options.name: static
options.help: Static aggregation, do not send and ignore any control messages.

options.name: lacp-passive
options.help: Passively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.

options.name: lacp-active
options.help: Actively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.

bundle.name: bundle
bundle.help: Enable/disable Link Aggregation Group (LAG) bundling for non-FortiLink interfaces.

member-withdrawal-behavior.name: member-withdrawal-behavior
member-withdrawal-behavior.help: Port behavior after it withdraws because of loss of control packets.

min-bundle.name: min-bundle
min-bundle.help: Minimum size of LAG bundle (1 - 24, default = 1).

max-bundle.name: max-bundle
max-bundle.help: Maximum size of LAG bundle (1 - 24, default = 24).

port.name: port
port.help: Ingress interface to which source guard is bound.

stp-settings.name: stp-settings
stp-settings.help: Configuration method to edit Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) settings used to prevent bridge loops.

local-override.name: local-override
local-override.help: Enable to configure local STP settings that override global STP settings.

name.name: name
name.help: Name of local STP settings configuration.

hello-time.name: hello-time
hello-time.help: Period of time between successive STP frame Bridge Protocol Data Units (BPDUs) sent on a port (1 - 10 sec, default = 2).

forward-time.name: forward-time
forward-time.help: Period of time a port is in listening and learning state (4 - 30 sec, default = 15).

max-age.name: max-age
max-age.help: Maximum time before a bridge port saves its configuration BPDU information (6 - 40 sec, default = 20).

max-hops.name: max-hops
max-hops.help: Maximum number of hops between the root bridge and the furthest bridge (1- 40, default = 20).

stp-instance.name: stp-instance
stp-instance.help: Configuration method to edit Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) instances.

override-snmp-sysinfo.name: override-snmp-sysinfo
override-snmp-sysinfo.help: Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP system information.

options.name: disable
options.help: Use the global SNMP system information.

options.name: enable
options.help: Override the global SNMP system information.

snmp-sysinfo.name: snmp-sysinfo
snmp-sysinfo.help: Configuration method to edit Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) system info.

engine-id.name: engine-id
engine-id.help: Local SNMP engine ID string (max 24 char).

override-snmp-trap-threshold.name: override-snmp-trap-threshold
override-snmp-trap-threshold.help: Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP trap threshold values.

options.name: enable
options.help: Override the global SNMP trap threshold values.

options.name: disable
options.help: Use the global SNMP trap threshold values.

snmp-trap-threshold.name: snmp-trap-threshold
snmp-trap-threshold.help: Configuration method to edit Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) trap threshold values.

trap-high-cpu-threshold.name: trap-high-cpu-threshold
trap-high-cpu-threshold.help: CPU usage when trap is sent.

trap-low-memory-threshold.name: trap-low-memory-threshold
trap-low-memory-threshold.help: Memory usage when trap is sent.

trap-log-full-threshold.name: trap-log-full-threshold
trap-log-full-threshold.help: Log disk usage when trap is sent.

override-snmp-community.name: override-snmp-community
override-snmp-community.help: Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP communities.

snmp-community.name: snmp-community
snmp-community.help: Configuration method to edit Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) communities.

ip.name: ip
ip.help: IPv4 address of the SNMP manager (host).

events.name: events

options.name: cpu-high
options.help: Send a trap when CPU usage too high.

options.name: mem-low
options.help: Send a trap when available memory is low.

options.name: log-full
options.help: Send a trap when log disk space becomes low.

options.name: intf-ip
options.help: Send a trap when an interface IP address is changed.

options.name: ent-conf-change
options.help: Send a trap when an entity MIB change occurs (RFC4133).

options.name: l2mac
options.help: Send a trap for Learning event (add/delete/movefrom/moveto).

events.default: cpu-high mem-low log-full intf-ip ent-conf-change l2mac

override-snmp-user.name: override-snmp-user
override-snmp-user.help: Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP users.

snmp-user.name: snmp-user
snmp-user.help: Configuration method to edit Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) users.

queries.name: queries
queries.help: Enable/disable SNMP queries for this user.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable SNMP queries for this user.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable SNMP queries for this user.

security-level.name: security-level
security-level.help: Security level for message authentication and encryption.

options.name: no-auth-no-priv
options.help: Message with no authentication and no privacy (encryption).

options.name: auth-no-priv
options.help: Message with authentication but no privacy (encryption).

switch-log.name: switch-log
switch-log.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch logging settings (logs are transferred to and inserted into the FortiGate event log).

local-override.name: local-override
local-override.help: Enable to configure local logging settings that override global logging settings.

status.name: status
status.help: Enable/disable adding FortiSwitch logs to the FortiGate event log.

options.name: enable
options.help: Add FortiSwitch logs to the FortiGate event log.

options.name: disable
options.help: Do not add FortiSwitch logs to the FortiGate event log.

severity.name: severity
severity.help: Severity of FortiSwitch logs that are added to the FortiGate event log.

remote-log.name: remote-log
remote-log.help: Configure logging by FortiSwitch device to a remote syslog server.

status.name: status
status.help: Enable/disable logging by FortiSwitch device to a remote syslog server.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable logging by FortiSwitch device to a remote syslog server.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable logging by FortiSwitch device to a remote syslog server.

server.name: server
server.help: IPv4 address of the remote syslog server.

severity.name: severity
severity.help: Severity of logs to be transferred to remote log server.

facility.name: facility
facility.help: Facility to log to remote syslog server.

storm-control.name: storm-control
storm-control.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch storm control for measuring traffic activity using data rates to prevent traffic disruption.

local-override.name: local-override
local-override.help: Enable to override global FortiSwitch storm control settings for this FortiSwitch.

rate.name: rate
rate.help: Rate in packets per second at which storm control drops excess traffic(0-10000000, default=500, drop-all=0).

burst-size-level.name: burst-size-level
burst-size-level.help: Increase level to handle bursty traffic (0 - 4, default = 0).

unknown-unicast.name: unknown-unicast
unknown-unicast.help: Enable/disable storm control to drop unknown unicast traffic.

unknown-multicast.name: unknown-multicast
unknown-multicast.help: Enable/disable storm control to drop unknown multicast traffic.

broadcast.name: broadcast
broadcast.help: Enable/disable storm control to drop broadcast traffic.

mirror.name: mirror
mirror.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch packet mirror.

static-mac.name: static-mac
static-mac.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch Static and Sticky MAC.

custom-command.name: custom-command
custom-command.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch commands to be pushed to this FortiSwitch device upon rebooting the FortiGate switch controller or the FortiSwitch.

command-name.name: command-name
command-name.help: Names of commands to be pushed to this FortiSwitch device, as configured under config switch-controller custom-command.

dhcp-snooping-static-client.name: dhcp-snooping-static-client
dhcp-snooping-static-client.help: Configure FortiSwitch DHCP snooping static clients.

igmp-snooping.name: igmp-snooping
igmp-snooping.help: Configure FortiSwitch IGMP snooping global settings.

local-override.name: local-override
local-override.help: Enable/disable overriding the global IGMP snooping configuration.

options.name: enable
options.help: Override the global IGMP snooping configuration.

options.name: disable
options.help: Use the global IGMP snooping configuration.

aging-time.name: aging-time
aging-time.help: Maximum time to retain a multicast snooping entry for which no packets have been seen (15 - 3600 sec, default = 300).

proxy.name: proxy
proxy.help: IGMP snooping proxy for the VLAN interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable IGMP snooping proxy on VLAN interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable IGMP snooping proxy on VLAN interface.

options.name: global
options.help: Use global setting for IGMP snooping proxy on VLAN interface.

querier.name: querier
querier.help: Enable/disable IGMP snooping querier for the VLAN interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable IGMP snooping querier on VLAN interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable IGMP snooping querier on VLAN interface.

802-1X-settings.name: 802-1X-settings
802-1X-settings.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch 802.1X global settings.

local-override.name: local-override
local-override.help: Enable to override global 802.1X settings on individual FortiSwitches.

link-down-auth.name: link-down-auth
link-down-auth.help: Authentication state to set if a link is down.

options.name: set-unauth
options.help: Interface set to unauth when down. Reauthentication is needed.

reauth-period.name: reauth-period
reauth-period.help: Reauthentication time interval (1 - 1440 min, default = 60, 0 = disable).

max-reauth-attempt.name: max-reauth-attempt
max-reauth-attempt.help: Maximum number of authentication attempts (0 - 15, default = 3).

mab-reauth.name: mab-reauth
mab-reauth.help: Enable or disable MAB reauthentication settings.

options.name: colon
options.help: Use colon as delimiter for MAC auth username.

options.name: hyphen
options.help: Use hyphen as delimiter for MAC auth username.

options.name: none
options.help: No delimiter for MAC auth username.

options.name: single-hyphen
options.help: Use single hyphen as delimiter for MAC auth username.

options.name: colon
options.help: Use colon as delimiter for MAC auth password.

options.name: hyphen
options.help: Use hyphen as delimiter for MAC auth password.

options.name: none
options.help: No delimiter for MAC auth password.

options.name: single-hyphen
options.help: Use single hyphen as delimiter for MAC auth password.

options.name: colon
options.help: Use colon as delimiter for calling station.

options.name: hyphen
options.help: Use hyphen as delimiter for calling station.

options.name: single-hyphen
options.help: Use single hyphen as delimiter for calling station.

options.name: colon
options.help: Use colon as delimiter for called station.

options.name: hyphen
options.help: Use hyphen as delimiter for called station.

options.name: single-hyphen
options.help: Use single hyphen as delimiter for called station.

ip.name: ip
ip.help: IP and mask for this interface.

allowaccess.name: allowaccess
allowaccess.help: Permitted types of management access to this interface.

distance.name: distance
distance.help: Administrative distance for the route (1 - 255, default = 10).

dst.name: dst
dst.help: Destination ip and mask for this route.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable dynamic gateway on this route.

options.name: enable
options.help: Disable dynamic gateway on this route.

options.name: disable
options.help: Do not use this DHCP server configuration.

lease-time.name: lease-time
lease-time.help: Lease time in seconds, 0 means unlimited.

dns-service.name: dns-service
dns-service.help: Options for assigning DNS servers to DHCP clients.

options.name: local
options.help: IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's DNS server IP address.

options.name: default
options.help: Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured DNS servers.

options.name: specify
options.help: Specify up to 3 DNS servers in the DHCP server configuration.

ntp-service.name: ntp-service
ntp-service.help: Options for assigning Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers to DHCP clients.

options.name: local
options.help: IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's NTP server IP address.

options.name: default
options.help: Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured NTP servers.

options.name: specify
options.help: Specify up to 3 NTP servers in the DHCP server configuration.

default-gateway.name: default-gateway
default-gateway.help: Default gateway IP address assigned by the DHCP server.

netmask.name: netmask
netmask.help: Netmask assigned by the DHCP server.

interface.name: interface
interface.help: DHCP server can assign IP configurations to clients connected to this interface.

options.name: fqdn
options.help: DHCP option in domain search option format.
